nav.script:
jQuery(document).ready(function(){
    var options = {
    blockID:"li37b1x0iwl5",
    devOnly:"",
    tabletBreakpoint: "768px",
    backHamburgerString: "BACK",
    instanceEditable: "false",
    helpDialogString: "At this browser width, your site navigation will appear in a hamburger menu.
If this is undesirable to you, here is a help article on how to fix it:",
    helpDialogHelpLinkString: "Help Article",
    helpDialogHelpLinkURL: "https://helpcenter.schoolloop.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015219231"
    }
new NavigationHolderPlayer(options)
})

br.strong: The Azusa Unified School District will remain closed through the end of the school year. Students will begin Distance Learning on April 6th.

p.b: >> See The AUSD Distance Learning Site <<

div.p: **4.21.2020 Board Meeting will be held via zoom - https://zoom.us/j/424623726 or +1-669-900-9128 with meeting code 424-623-726.**

p.br: Need to contact us? Use this form!

p.strong: Para ver esta página en español, puede cambiar la configuración del idioma en la parte superior de la página

div.p: Happy New Year! Our students and staff have started the new year energized and excited for the success and progress that lie ahead for our students and the District. The start of a new year is a time of anticipation. The pages of the book are empty, waiting for the story that we will write with the time we have this year.

span.span: The new year is a chance for us to dream big dreams for our schools and students. Just before the holiday break, we learned that Paramount Elementary was named a California Distinguished School. This award recognizes outstanding education programs, practices and is indicative of the great work occurring not only at Paramount but district-wide.

p.span:
We ensure each student attains or exceeds academic proficiency, graduates from AUSD,
and is college and career ready.

div.div: Children who will be five-years old by September 1, 2018, can enroll now for kindergarten for the 2018-19 school year. Don't wait. Enroll today!

jsLayoutModule jsCMS2Block sl-cms2-column-container sl-cms2-column-container__width-33 sl-cms2-column-container__border

div.div: Our graduation rate exceeds the state and national rates!
AUSD graduates are now succeeding at many of America's best colleges and universities. Click below to see a list!

div.div: There are many ways for parents to get involved!
We welcome parent involvement at our schools, and there are many ways to take part. Click below for some possibilities!

div.p: Keep up to date with Azusa Unified by following us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and subscribing to our YouTube channel. And you can take AUSD wherever you go by downloading our app for iPhone or Android.
